thought: To craft a shield, I need to place 1 oak_plank, 1 spruce_plank, 1 birch_plank, 1 crimson_plank, and 1 iron_ingot on the crafting grid. First, I will move the oak_wood from slot 41 to slot 1, which is the top left corner of the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 41 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: shield

Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 14 with quantity 4

thought: To craft a shield, I need to place 3 planks on top of each other and an iron ingot in the middle. The first step is to place a plank in the first row of the crafting grid. I have a spruce plank in slot 31, so I will move it to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 31 to slot 1 with quantity 1
